1010100000010101 1110011100110111 1 -> sum: 1000111101001101, cout: 1
0011000001110000 0110100101110101 0 -> sum: 1001100111100101, cout: 0

0000000001100000 1000001011101101 0 -> sum: 1000001101001101, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
